form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To improve the response to victims of child sex trafficking.

section.header: Response to victims of child sex trafficking
section.text: Section 404(b)(1)(P)(iii) of the Missing Childrenâ€™s Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5773(b)(1)(P)(iii)) is amended by striking child prostitution and inserting child sex trafficking, including child prostitution.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives January 27, 2015.
